definition: despite anything to the contrary (usually following a concession)
details:
adverb
- despite anything to the contrary (usually following a concession)
= example: despite anything to the contrary (usually following a concession)
= synonyms: nevertheless, withal, all the same, even so, nonetheless, notwithstanding, yet, still
- in whatever way or manner
= example: in whatever way or manner
- to whatever degree or extent
= example: to whatever degree or extent
- by contrast
